abstract: Google is not officially a defendant in this case, but most of Samsung’s phones include Android, and some of the Apple patents involve features that Google put in Android.
snippet: Google is not officially a defendant in this case, but most of Samsung’s phones include Android, and some of the Apple patents involve features that Google put in Android.
lead_paragraph: In Apple’s latest patent fight with Samsung Electronics, lawyers on both sides are relying on the power of a good story to sway a jury. And Samsung is borrowing one from Google.

headline.main: Samsung Calls on Google Executive to Defend Innovation
